remarks: If all of the terms of a finite product are larger or equal to ` 1 ` , so is the product.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodge1.ph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprodge1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodge1.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
fprodge1.ge $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> 1 <_ B ) $.
fprodge1 $p |- ( ph -> 1 <_ prod_ k e. A B ) $.
$d A k $.
